body:
Hello :3 as some of you guys may know I recently rented a server, it has until now survival games and bow spleef, I was wondering if you guys could tell me how to set commands for mods and to interact with signs. Evocal put perms for sg signs except I was an idiot, thought I figured out how to put the commands and now the default people can't use the signs anymore -_- anyone willing to come on my server and do it (mssg me on skype for ip) or tell me commands here.
These are plugins I am using that I need perms:

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/betterheal (I need the /feed for people)
http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/bowspleef (I need the people to do be able to click signs)
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/maxbans (I need for /ban, /tempban, warn(mods of course))
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/survival-games (I need to be able to click signs, and vote to start game)
I also use essentials and group manager

NOTE: I want to be able to announce to public today xD (but no advertising here)

title: Server Permissions Help [help still needed]

replies.body:
I've used Survival Games and MaxBans before.

Add these perms to the default for SG:
Player Permissions:
  • sg.arena.join.# - Allows the user to join a certain arena
  • sg.arena.join.* - Allows the user to join all arenas
  • sg.arena.vote - Allows the user to vote to start (/sg vote)
  • sg.arena.spectate - Allows a user to spectate a game
  • sg.lobby.join - Allows the use of /sg join to join the lobby
Maxbans permissions are like this:
maxbans.[command]

So add
maxbans.ban
maxbans.tempban
maxbans.mute
etc.

If you are still having troubles, i'm perfectly wiling to come on your server in a few hours to help you out.
